mlb_batting_dataframe.description: Contains per-game hitting statistics for MLB batters. Each row represents a single game’s batting stats for one batter.

columns.name: team_name
columns.description: Name of the team the batter played for in this game.

columns.name: ab
columns.description: Number of at-bats in the game.

columns.name: h
columns.description: Number of hits in the game.

columns.name: ops
columns.description: On-base plus slugging for that game.

mlb_pitching_dataframe.description: Contains per-game pitching statistics for MLB pitchers. Each row represents a single game pitched by one pitcher.

columns.name: team_name
columns.description: Name of the pitcher’s team for this game.

columns.name: er
columns.description: Earned runs allowed in the game.

columns.name: era
columns.description: Earned Run Average for the game, scaled to 9 innings.

columns.name: starter
columns.description: Indicates if the pitcher was the starting pitcher (1) or a reliever (0).

plate_appearance_dataframe.description: Contains per plate appearance data in MLB. Each row is one matchup between a batter and a pitcher in a particular game situation.

columns.name: batter_name
columns.description: Name of the batter in this plate appearance.

columns.name: pitcher_name
columns.description: Name of the pitcher in this plate appearance.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Outcome of the plate appearance (e.g., single, double, HR, strikeout, walk).

columns.name: runners_on_base
columns.description: Runner configuration on base before the plate appearance (e.g., 1B, 2B, 3B).

columns.name: outs
columns.description: Number of outs before this plate appearance.

columns.name: starter
columns.description: Indicates if the pitcher was a starter (1) or a reliever (0) for this appearance.

pitch_dataframe.description: Contains per pitch data in MLB. Each row represents a single pitch thrown by a pitcher against a specific batter.

columns.name: pitch_type
columns.description: Type of the pitch (e.g., fastball, slider, curve).

columns.name: velocity
columns.description: Pitch velocity in miles per hour (MPH).

columns.name: ball
columns.description: Indicates if the pitch was a ball (1) or not (0).

columns.name: strike
columns.description: Indicates if the pitch was a strike (1) or not (0).

columns.name: swinging_strike
columns.description: Indicates if the pitch was swung at and missed (1) or not (0).

columns.name: starter
columns.description: Indicates if the pitcher was a starter (1) or reliever (0).

nfl_main_df.description: Contains per-game stats for NFL players. Each row represents one player’s performance in a single game.

columns.name: passing_yards
columns.description: Total passing yards (commonly used for quarterbacks).

columns.name: rushing_yards
columns.description: Total rushing yards (often used for running backs or other positions).

columns.name: receiving_yards
columns.description: Total receiving yards (often for wide receivers or tight ends).

columns.name: touchdowns
columns.description: Total touchdowns in the game (passing, rushing, or receiving).

columns.name: home
columns.description: Indicates if the team was at home (1) or away (0).

columns.name: passes
columns.description: Number of pass attempts (used for QB threshold).

columns.name: targets
columns.description: Number of pass targets (used for receiver threshold).

columns.name: carries
columns.description: Number of rushing attempts (used for RB threshold).

nfl_play_by_play.description: Contains down-by-down details for NFL games. Each row is one play from a specific game.

columns.name: quarter
columns.description: Which quarter the play took place (1-4, possibly OT).

columns.name: game_seconds_remaining
columns.description: How many seconds remain in the game at the start of this play.

columns.name: yards_to_go
columns.description: Yards needed for a 1st down on this play.

columns.name: yards_to_endzone
columns.description: Yards remaining to reach the end zone on this play.

columns.name: play_description
columns.description: Textual description of the play’s outcome.

columns.name: home
columns.description: Indicates if the offensive team is at home (1) or away (0).

nba_main_dataframe.description: Contains per-game stats for NBA players. Each row represents one player’s performance in a single game.

columns.name: opponent_name
columns.description: The opposing team in this game.

columns.name: pts
columns.description: Total points scored by the player.

columns.name: min
columns.description: Number of minutes the player was on the court.

nba_play_by_play.description: Contains per-play details for NBA games. Each row is a single play from a particular game.

columns.name: quarter
columns.description: Which quarter the play took place (1-4, possibly OT).

columns.name: time_remaining
columns.description: Time remaining in the quarter (MM:SS format).

columns.name: offense_player_name
columns.description: Player involved in the offensive action (e.g., scoring, passing).

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of play (e.g., shot made, turnover, foul, assist, rebound).
